DISCOVER

Get To Know Shree Shiv Villa

Welcoming tranquility seeking tourist, The Shree Shiv Villa is a comfortable accommodated facility near The Sasan Gir National Park, Which can be used for various personal and professional events as well as a stay facility.

TOURISM

Popular Attractions

Gir National Park

Spanning over 1,400 square kilometres, Gir National Park is a protected habitat for the Asiatic Lion along with other species like leopards, wild boars and hyenas that reside here.
Suggested Duration - 3-4 hours

Somnath Temple

A revered pilgrimage centre, Somnath Temple lies on the confluence of the Kapila, Hiran and Sarasvati rivers. It is believed to be the first of the 12 jyotirlinga shrines.
Suggested Duration - 1-2 hours

Kamleshwar Dam

Also known as Hiran-I Dam, Kamleshwar Dam has a height of 25 metres and a length of over 1,300 metres. It was primarily created for irrigation purposes in 1959.
Suggested Duration - 30 minutes

Mahabat Maqbara

Built by Nawab Mahabat Khan II of Junagadh, Mahabat Maqbara is a royal palace-mausoleum with ornately carved arches, domes and towering minarets encircled by narrow spiral staircases.
Suggested Duration - 1 hour
